title: Is Facebook Hitting a Wall, iPic Serves Dinner With a Movie, Bitcoin Hits New Low
itunes:title: Is Facebook Hitting a Wall, iPic Serves Dinner With a Movie, Bitcoin Hits New Low
description:
Sarah Frier, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, discusses Facebook’s reporting their slowest user growth on record. Hamid Hashemi, CEO at iPic Entertainment, talks about the luxury restaurant and theater chain going public. Dave Liedtka, Bloomberg News Cross Asset Reporter, and Camila Russo, Bloomberg News Crypto Currencies Reporter, explain how Bitcoin slumping to its low for the year. We Drive to the Close with Barry Bannister, Head of Institutional Equity Strategy at Stifel. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
